"A school will be established as soon as possible, and the Lord will open the way. . . . With all the buildings in connection with the main building, we have great advantages. If we will walk humbly with God, and do according to that which He hath prospered us, we will have Christ as our friend and our helper. 'If any man will come after Me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow Me.' These are the terms of our discipleship. Will we comply with them?"
